revised_title: Microscopical Observations on Blood Vessels and Membranes in Intestines
tldr: Anthony van Leeuwenhoek's microscopical observations on the blood vessels and membranes of the intestines reveal the presence of numerous blood vessels, fat particles, and the complexity of the intestinal structure. The study also suggests that the protrusion of blood from the vessels may be caused by a sudden fright or sorrow.
